name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Abridged Memories
description:
"Welcome player-boy to the next duel monster experience on your machine. Play if you dare." - Pegasus, maybe

The rules are simple:

  1. You select your favorite character.
  2. You play games until you lose.
  3. Each time you win a game, you add cards to your deck.

The game is inspired by the anime and by the abridged series from Little Kuriboh.

The game is in alpha state. Expect some bugs (like instantly losing the game). My priority right now is fixing all the bugs.

This is a small personal project funded by love and curiosity.

If someone from Konami asks me to stop, I will end the project. Until then, i plan to release a new version every Monday (the worst day of the week) until the game is fun.

If you enjoy this game, try Konami's official  game, Yu-Gi-Oh Master duel on Steam.
